Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has bactericidal activity (By similarity). May play a role in the antimicrobial protection of sperm and urogenital tract epithelia. Epididymis-specific, with highest levels in the initial segment and distal caput.
